name: Firefly Delight
description:
Camouflage yourself near the magical plants to hide from your shadow.

You can hear your heart racing when it gets close to you so be careful!

Your goal is to activate all 7 colored shrines 

There are primary colors (red, blue, violet, yellow) and then there are the color combinations that your chameleon can make.

Color combinations:

Red+Blue = Purple

Red+Yellow = Orange

Blue+Yellow = Green

Controls:

WASD to move

Left click to aim for fireflies

Github repo link: https://github.com/Noixelfer/Telenav2021
